property.name: url
property.label: URL
property.description: URL to be shared, leave blank for the current page.

property.name: title
property.label: Title
property.description: Title text used as a level-2 header.

property.name: label
property.label: Aria abel
property.default: Share this page on social networks

property.name: emailSubject
property.label: Email subject
property.description: Subject of the sharing email, or leave subject and body blank to remove the email option.

property.name: emailBody
property.label: Email body
property.description: Body of the sharing email, or leave subject and body blank to remove the email option.
property.default: I thought you might find this page interesting.

property.name: networks
property.label: Networks

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
